publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3646 Aileen Campbell: Black Watch Scoops Four Olivier Awards—That the Parliament congratulates the play, Black Watch, on receiving four awards, for Best New Play, Best Director, Best Sound Design and Best Theatre Choreographer, at the 2009 Lawrence Olivier Awards; notes the worldwide success of Black Watch and its ability to bring to life vividly the experiences of Black Watch soldiers in Iraq, and recognises that, since its inception in February 2006, the National Theatre of Scotland has supported and produced high quality work, which continues to entertain, move and excite audiences.

S3M-3646 Black Watch Scoops Four Olivier Awards (lodged on 9 March 2009) Murdo Fraser*, Liam McArthur*, Sandra White*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie Hepburn*, Patricia Ferguson*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Nanette Milne*, Bob Doris*, Patrick Harvie*, Des McNulty*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Stewart Maxwell*, Ian McKee*, Anne McLaughlin*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3646 Black Watch Scoops Four Olivier Awards (lodged on 9 March 2009) Hugh Henry*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Maureen Watt*
S3M-3646 Black Watch Scoops Four Olivier Awards (lodged on 9 March 2009) Angela Constance*

S3M-3646 Aileen Campbell: Black Watch Scoops Four Olivier Awards—That the Parliament congratulates the play, Black Watch, on receiving four awards, for Best New Play, Best Director, Best Sound Design and Best Theatre Choreographer, at the 2009 Lawrence Olivier Awards; notes the worldwide success of Black Watch and its ability to bring to life vividly the experiences of Black Watch soldiers in Iraq, and recognises that, since its inception in February 2006, the National Theatre of Scotland has supported and produced high quality work, which continues to entertain, move and excite audiences. Supported by: Murdo Fraser, Liam McArthur, Sandra White, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Alasdair Allan, Jamie Hepburn, Patricia Ferguson, Rob Gibson, Brian Adam, Nanette Milne, Bob Doris, Patrick Harvie, Des McNulty, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd, Stewart Maxwell, Ian McKee, Anne McLaughlin, Robin Harper, Hugh Henry, Mr Frank McAveety, Maureen Watt, Angela Constance, Michael Matheson*, Dave Thompson*, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Jack McConnell*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-3646 Black Watch Scoops Four Olivier Awards (lodged on 9 March 2009) Christine Grahame*
S3M-3646 Black Watch Scoops Four Olivier Awards (lodged on 9 March 2009) Alison McInnes*
S3M-3646 Black Watch Scoops Four Olivier Awards (lodged on 9 March 2009) David Stewart*, Mary Scanlon*
